alert.note: Alert for Apache (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 30 at 10:59AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL 12 AM MDT TUESDAY... ...REPLACES FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...Chinle and areas near Canyon de Chelly. * WHEN...Until 1200 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding along Chinle Wash. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1041 AM MST /1141 AM MDT/, Emergency Management reported that flooding in populated areas near Chinle Wash has greatly improved due to mitigation efforts in rebuilding protective berms. However, high flows in Chinle Wash are expected to continue through at least Monday evening with areas near the wash still at risk of flooding. - Chinle Wash is the most likely place to experience minor flooding, including near Holiday Inn on Route 7. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Chinle and Canyon De Chelly National Monument. - Visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for more information on flood safety.
info.instruction: Keep children away from Chinle Wash! Water levels can rise rapidly and sweep children away. Stay away or be swept away! The banks of creeks and washes are unstable and unsafe during any flooding event.
